title: ICE with doctests

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body: ### Code ```Rust /// let mat: Matrix = Matrix::new(3, 6, 0..); /// /// let neighbors = mat.neighbors(0, 0); /// assert_eq!(neighbors.next().unwrap(), Neighbor {loc: (1,0), val: &6}); ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.59.0-nightly (0b42deacc 2021-12-09) binary: rustc commit-hash: 0b42deaccc2cbe17a68067aa5fdb76104369e1fd commit-date: 2021-12-09 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.59.0-nightly LLVM version: 13.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` running 1 test thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: sentinel == STR_SENTINEL', /rustc/0b42deaccc2cbe17a68067aa5fdb76104369e1fd/compiler/rustc_serialize/src/opaque.rs:669:9 stack backtrace: 0: rust_begin_unwind at /rustc/0b42deaccc2cbe17a68067aa5fdb76104369e1fd/library/std/src/panicking.rs:498:5 1: core::panicking::panic_fmt at /rustc/0b42deaccc2cbe17a68067aa5fdb76104369e1fd/library/core/src/panicking.rs:107:14 2: core::panicking::panic at /rustc/0b42deaccc2cbe17a68067aa5fdb76104369e1fd/library/core/src/panicking.rs:48:5 3: >::decode 4: ::extract_one 5: ::extract_lib 6: ::find_library_crate 7: ::maybe_load_library_crate 8: ::load 9: ::maybe_resolve_crate 10: ::maybe_resolve_crate 11: ::maybe_process_path_extern 12: ::lookup_import_candidates::<&::smart_resolve_report_errors::{closure#1}> 13: ::smart_resolve_report_errors 14: ::smart_resolve_path_fragment::{closure#0} 15: ::smart_resolve_path_fragment 16: ::visit_ty 17: ::visit_local 18: ::visit_block 19: ::visit_fn 20: rustc_ast::visit::walk_item:: 21: ::resolve_item 22: ::visit_block 23: ::visit_fn 24: rustc_ast::visit::walk_item:: 25: ::resolve_item 26: ::late_resolve_crate 27: ::time::<(), ::resolve_crate::{closure#0}> 28: rustc_interface::passes::configure_and_expand 29: ::expansion 30: ::enter::, rustc_errors::ErrorReported>> 31: rustc_span::with_source_map::, rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#1}> 32: >::set::, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorReported>>::{closure#0}::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorReported>> note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace. error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.59.0-nightly (0b42deacc 2021-12-09) running on x86_64-unkno``` ```wn-linux-gnu ``` ``` note: compiler flags: -C codegen-units=1 -C embed-bitcode=no --crate-type bin query stack during panic: end of query stack Couldn't compile the test.test src/matrix.rs - matrix::Matrix::neighbors (line 286) ... FAILED ``` Basically, doc tests seem unhappy
